name: Inferless
tagline: Deploy any machine learning models in minutes.
description: Deploy any machine learning model in production stress-free with ultra-low cold starts. Scale from single user to billions and only pay when you use.

name: „ÉÑSupercut
tagline: Record your screen, share instantly, look like a PRO
description: „ÉÑSupercut is beautiful, simple and fast. Just record your screen, share instantly and look professional...with a little help from AI.

name: Zapier MCP
tagline: Connect your AI to any app with Zapier MCP
description: Zapier MCP gives your AI assistant direct access to over 8,000+ apps and 30,000+ actions without complex API integrations. Now your AI can perform real tasks like sending messages, managing data, scheduling events, and updating records.

name: AI Voices by Asyncflow v1.0
tagline: Premium AI voice quality without the premium price tag.
description: Podcastle's AI Voices hub is the World's largest library of lifelike AI Voices, powered by our proprietary AI model called Asyncflow v1.0. Choose from 1000+ voices and turn text to speech in a matter of seconds.

name: Jotform Boards
tagline: Generate kanban tasks from AI agent conversations and more
description: Unlike other task management solutions, Jotform Boards empowers you to resolve customer requests by syncing the forms, AI agents, documents, and workflows you‚Äôve created to your board.

name: mcpt
tagline: Managed registry for MCP servers
description: mcpt by Mintlify is a managed registry for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers, which act as bridges between AI applications and external tools or data sources. Find and explore reliable, up-to-date MCP servers.

name: DeepSeek-V3-0324
tagline: Code like 3.7 but open source
description: DeepSeek-V3-0324 is the significant, open-source (MIT) update to DeepSeek's V3 model. It improves coding abilities nearing Claude 3.7 Sonnet, plus reasoning improvements.

name: Meilisearch AI
tagline: Boost relevance and UX with fast hybrid and semantic search
description: üöÄ Meilisearch is a superfast search engine for developers built in Rust. Our latest release introduces AI-powered semantic and hybrid search, blending full-text, semantic, and vector DB capabilities for smarter, faster results.

name: new.email by Resend
tagline: Build cross-platform emails using natural language.
description: new.‚Å†email is for developers, marketers, designers, and anyone who wants to create beautiful emails using natural language. Start by creating a template and refine it until it looks great and then test how your emails look in real life.

name: Break Me 2.0
tagline: Interactive website to relax and clear your mind.
description: Break Me is a fun little time-waster that helps you relax and clears your mind. It‚Äôs super simple‚Äîjust mess around and, out of nowhere, it'll hit you with something you weren‚Äôt even thinking about. It‚Äôs weirdly addictive.

name: IP Portal
tagline: Protect, license, and monetize your IP on your own terms
description: Take control over your IP. The IP Portal allows you to protect and license your ideas ‚Äî art, music, likeness, and more ‚Äî by dictating how your IP is used across the internet and in AI training. Unleash seamless monetization for your IP on your own terms.

name: ChurnDog
tagline: Recover lost revenue & keep more customers
description: Built for B2B SaaS, ChurnDog recovers lost revenue and prevents churn with automated workflows and real-time insights.

name: MailSnitch
tagline: Tag your emails to see who‚Äôs selling it
description: Trust is good. Tagging is better. Automatically tag your email using Plus Addressing or Catch-All method. No manual effort ‚Äì everything‚Äôs saved to history so you can see who‚Äôs behind unwanted spam (if you receive it to that tagged mail).

name: SmolDocling
tagline: 256M VLM for end-to-end document AI
description: SmolDocling, from Hugging Face and IBM Research, is the ultra-compact (256M) open VLM for end-to-end document conversion. Extracts text, layout, tables, code, and more from images.

name: GitHubTree
tagline: Visualize repo structures in tree view.
description: Easily visualize and explore the folder/directory structure of any public GitHub repository. Copy file paths with a single click.

name: JoinTheQueue
tagline: Modern queue management system for retail establishments
description: Transform your business with our modern QR-based queue management system. Reduce wait times and improve customer satisfaction.

name: OneRack
tagline: Social platform to discover who‚Äôs strongest at your gym
description: Share your gym lifts, track your progress, and see who‚Äôs lifting at YOUR gym. OneRack is a social fitness platform that makes it easy to post your lifts, connect with others, and discover new lifters at all the gyms in your country!

name: Shit Drop Game
tagline: Catch shits with your hands!
description: Catch shits with hand gesture using webcam! For the best experience, play on a laptop or PC. It works on smartphones, but catching falling shits is way better on a bigger screen. Play for free. Climb the leaderboard. Leave your shits on the blockchain.

name: OTTO GOOGLE ADS
tagline: AI Google Ads ‚Äì Launch Winning Campaigns & Make Money
description: Launch high-converting campaigns in minutes‚Äînot days. OTTO automates setup, bidding, targeting & A/B testing, eliminating manual PPC work. Link your site, review AI-optimized drafts, and launch smarter ads with better results. Set your Google Ads to OTTO.

name: Indie Boosting
tagline: The first distribution network for solo founders
description: We Distribute Your Products So You Can Focus On Building! Ever heard of "Vibe Distributing"? Just get your products listed and let our AI agents handle the rest. Have your clones handle marketing, sales and support while you focus on the core product.
